mapper.update: update meeting set m_name = #{m_name}, m_content = #{m_content}, m_person = #{m_person}, m_type = #{m_type}, m_meetingid = #{m_meetingid}, m_meetingurl = #{m_meetingurl}, m_meetingtime = #{m_meetingtime}, m_createtime = #{m_createtime}, m_details = #{m_details} where m_uuid = #{m_uuid};
